fullText:
### Images All images come from [Unsplash](https://www.unsplash.com). The kind folks over there made all their images public domain, meaning they **do not need attirbution.** ### Works Cited #### Editorial Hanif, Mehmood. "What Data Is Collected About You Online and How to Stop It." 15 June 2018. _GlobalSign._ 14 January 2020. [https://www.globalsign.com/en/blog/what-data-is-collected-about-you-online/](https://www.globalsign.com/en/blog/what-data-is-collected-about-you-online/) DeCew, Judith. "Privacy." 21 March 2018. _The Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy (Spring 2018 Edition)._ 16 January 2020. . #### The Social Contract On Privacy Bronskill, Jim. "Border agency's digital device searches broke the law, privacy watchdog says." 7 January 2020. _CTV News._ 17 January 2020. [https://www.ctvnews.ca/politics/border-agency-s-digital-device-searches-broke-the-law-privacy-watchdog-says-1.4757210](https://www.ctvnews.ca/politics/border-agency-s-digital-device-searches-broke-the-law-privacy-watchdog-says-1.4757210) Lloyd, Sharon A and Susanne Sreedhar. "Hobbes’s Moral and Political Philosophy." 21 March 2019. _The Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy (Spring 2019 Edition)._ Ed. Edward N. Zalta. 15 January 2020. . #### An Aesthetic Perspective on Oppresion Kirton, David. "Exhibition in China reflects on loss of anonymity to recognition technology." 24 December 2019. _Reuters._ 13 January 2020. . Mollman, Steve. "China’s new weapon of choice is your face." 5 October 2019. _Quartz._ 14 January 2020. . #### The Ethics of Whistleblowing Barnes, Harry Elmer and Ronald Fletcher. "Auguste Comte." 15 January 2020. _Encyclopædia Britannica._ Encyclopædia Britannica, inc. 13 January 2020. . Macaskill, Ewen and Gabriel Dance. "THE NSA FILES." 1 November 2013. _The Guardian._ Fielding Cage and Greg Chen. 16 January 2020. . Mastin, L. "Altruism." 2010. _Philosophy Basics._ 15 January 2020. [https://www.philosophybasics.com/branch_altruism.html](https://www.philosophybasics.com/branch_altruism.html) #### Your Body is Not You Newman, Lily Hay. "Facial Recognition Has Already Reached Its Breaking Point." 22 May 2019. _Wired._ 16 January 2020. . #### Your Perfect Partner is Among Infinite Worlds Sinhababu, Neil. "POSSIBLE GIRLS." _Pacific Philosophical Quarterly_ (2008): 254-260. #### Privacy and Power Dynamics in the Minority Report _Minority Report_. Dir. Steven Spielberg. Perf. Gerald R. Molen, et al. DreamWorks Pictures. 2003. Film. #### Letter #1 Cole, David. "The Chinese Room Argument." 21 March 2020. _The Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy (Spring 2020 Edition)._ Ed. Edward N. Zalta. 21 January 2020. . #### Letter #2 Britannica, The Editors of Encyclopaedia. "Cogito, ergo sum." 12 February 2016. _Encyclopædia Britannica._ Encyclopædia Britannica, inc. 17 January 2020. . ### Technologies This magazine relies on the following open-source code repos: - Vue - Vuex - Vue-router - Vuetify - Markdown - Markdown Components - Babel-runtime

Thanks to [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com) for hosting, domain registration, and static asset management.
